entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
